artist: Unknown (British), 19th century; Formerly attributed to Francesco Bartolozzi
description: at left:  half-length portrait of frowning man, bent forward on books (?); man wears a cap tilted to PR; at right:  half-length figure of a woman resting her chin on her PL hand, reading a letter held in her PR hand, while an old man with a frowning face peers over her shoulder
medium: Pen and black ink and gray  wash over black chalk
title: Half-Length Caricatures of a Suspicious Man and an Ill-Sorted Couple
